## CreatePlayerOptions interface

创建 Player 的配置项

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CreatePlayerOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoload?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.autoload.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否自动加载, 默认值: <code>true</code> |
|  [autoplay?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.autoplay.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否自动播放, 仅当 <code>autoload</code> 为 true 时有效, 默认值 <code>true</code> |
|  [canvas](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.canvas.md) | HTMLCanvasElement | canvas element |
|  [chunkSize?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.chunksize.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> 加载时一个区块的大小, 默认值: <code>10</code> |
|  [fps?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.fps.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> 播放帧率, 默认值: <code>30</code> |
|  [frames](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.frames.md) | string\[\] | 图片帧地址 |
|  [lazyload?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.lazyload.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否启用懒加载, 仅当 <code>autoload</code> 为 true 时有效, 默认值: <code>true</code> |
|  [loop?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.loop.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否循环播放 |
|  [useWorker?](./fastframe.createplayeroptions.useworker.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否使用 worker, 默认为自动检测. |
